resources.string: „My Storyteller” is a personalized storytelling app. You become your own character in different stories and complete parts of story templates provided by the app. You have the option to edit the resulting stories before saving them. Press the fab button to add a new story and follow the steps. The stories which are saved! appear on the main screen. Then touch a story item to access the story content (and share it with your friends!), or swipe left to delete that story. Enjoy!

\t\t\tClose your eyes and imagine… \n\t\t\tYou find yourself on the beach of a potentially remote island. You look around and try to accommodate with the new surroundings. You have the ocean in front of you, and a forrest behind. Describe the ocean, the sky, the sand and the forrest using attributes that could characterize each of them. You can use one or more attributes (real or imaginary) in each answer (E.g. calm/ cloudy/ soft and clean, with a few seashells/ dense). \nThis is available also for the next parts of the story (next screens).

\t\t\tYou keep running for several minutes through the forrest, until you realize that the danger is gone. But what do you now see in front of you? A house, in the middle of the forrest, is in your path. Are you not alone? You get closer.
How does the house look like?
\t\t\t…You put yourself together and find your courage to go inside. You move closer, cautiously, and open the creaking door. You step inside.
Describe the interior of the house:

\t\t\t…You see another door at the back of the house. You try it out and reach an amazingly well kept garden, with all sorts of fruit and flowers. You have just made a few steps around, when you hear someone calling you, louder and louder. For a few seconds, you feel that you simply cannot move. A bright light forces you to close your eyes. When you open your eyes again, you are in your own home, laying in your bed. What happened?
